thread.title: Nice and cosy hotel
thread.title_full: Nice and cosy hotel - Review of Hotel Le Burgundy, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Nicolas V
title: Nice and cosy hotel
text:
We booked for 1 night , but everything was so great that at the end we stayed for 3 more nights .
The room was big enough , also the bathroom . Very cosy atmosph√®re...
One thing :
We should ask too times for the mini bar refill
The bar at the hotel is very nice , with a good wine and drinks choice.
The room service menu is maybe the minus ( frozen pizza , and poor club sandwich )
But we will be back sure thanks
